title: Question 1 （11 Points）
question: Which of the following statements is true about openGauss installation and deployment?
choices: A. Before installing openGauss, you do not need to check whether the hardware configuration of the server meets the requirements because openGauss has low requirements on hardware.
B. During the openGauss installation, you need to set proper database parameters based on the actual environment, such as memory allocation and storage path.
C. After decompressing the openGauss installation package, you can directly run the installation program without worrying about the OS version compatibility.
D. During the openGauss installation, you do not need to configure any network parameters. It automatically obtains the network configuration.

title: Question 2 （11 Points）
question: Which of the following statements is true about the openGauss community ecosystem?
choices: A. The openGauss community provides a rich ecosystem, including but not limited to documents, tools, plug-ins, and training materials.
B. The openGauss community does not allow external contributors to commit code or provide improvement suggestions.
C. The openGauss community supports only enterprise users and does not open resources to individual developers.
D. The activities of the openGauss community are limited to online activities. There are no offline communication activities.

title: Question 3 （11 Points）
question: In openGauss, to ensure user access security, an administrator needs to set proper authentication rules in the "pg_hba.conf" configuration file. Assume that you want to allow user "admin" from a specific IP address 192.168.1.100 to use the SHA-256 password hash for authentication and access the database named testdb. In addition, user admin must use the SSL connection. Which of the following rules should be added to the "pg_hba.conf" file?

title: Question 4 （11 Points）
question: In openGauss, which of the following threads is used to start the corresponding sub-threads when necessary to perform cleanup and recycling and reset the thread after the backend thread breaks down?

title: Question 5 （11 Points）
question: In openGauss, which of the following technologies is used to improve the efficiency and reliability of the log replay mechanism and can be adjusted using the "recovery_max_workers" parameter?

title: Question 6 （11 Points）
question: Assume you are trying to optimize a large enterprise-grade Java application deployed on the server with the Kunpeng 920 processor. Recently, you have noticed slow response and low throughput in peak hours. One cause may be a performance bottleneck in the Java virtual machine (JVM). To resolve these problems, you use the Kunpeng DevKit Java Profiler for in-depth analysis. Which of the following is not provided by Java Profiler and is least relevant to directly locating and solving JVM performance problems?
choices: A. Analyze heap memory snapshots for locating memory leakage and allocation problems.
B. Analyze thread information in real time, including thread status and deadlock detection.
C. Monitor database connection pool status and provide optimization suggestions.
D. Analyze source code-level performance bottlenecks and provide optimization suggestions.

title: Question 7 （11 Points）
question: When the Kunpeng GCC compiler is used for software development, which of the following statements about function inlining is true?
choices: A. The "noinline" attribute is only a suggestion for the compiler to ignore specific functions during inlining.
B. When the "-O2" optimization level is set, the compiler automatically identifies and inlines all static functions that are called only once in the program.
C. When the "inline" keyword is used, the compiler will inline the corresponding functions.
D. The "always_inline" attribute ensures the compiler forcibly inlines specified functions during compilation.

title: Question 8 （11 Points）
question: The performance optimization solution of Kunpeng BoostKit for Virtualization for TaiShan 200 servers covers multiple levels. Which of the following measures is specific to the virtualization environment and directly improves virtual machine (VM) resource allocation efficiency and performance?
choices: A. Apply the core binding policy to VMs to ensure the VMs run on specified physical CPU cores.
B. Adjust the BIOS configurations to check the hardware validity, including the memory refresh frequency.
C. Disable the transparent huge page function at the OS layer to reduce the memory management overhead.
D. Upgrade the GCC compiler to the latest version for better compilation performance.

title: Question 9 （11 Points）
question: In complex software porting scenarios, especially when the x86 architecture is changed to Kunpeng, developers need to identify the factors that directly trigger compilation errors or alarms. Which of the following factors does not directly cause compilation errors or alarms?
choices: A. The data representation, alignment rules and byte sequence differ between the source and target architectures.
B. The code integrates assembly instructions or inline assembly code snippets unique to the x86 architecture.
C. The Maven version of the build tool is too early.
D. The compiler configurations are not adapted to the target platform, such as the instruction set or processor.

title: Question 10 （11 Points）
question: Assume you are processing a large number of credit assessment tasks at a financial company. Your team is considering using the machine learning algorithm library of Kunpeng BoostKit for Big Data to improve computing performance. Which of the following reasons is not a reason for choosing the Kunpeng BoostKit?
choices: A. The Kunpeng BoostKit provides multiple algorithms, such as classification and regression, recommendation, feature engineering, pattern mining, and outlier detection, to meet the diversified requirements of the financial sector.
B. The Kunpeng BoostKit supports all Spark MLlib algorithms without learning new APIs.
C. The Kunpeng BoostKit significantly reduces code modification and improves performance through simple configurations.
D. The Kunpeng BoostKit second-order optimizer reduces computing complexity and accelerates model training.

title: Question 11 （11 Points）
question: In a Kunpeng-based cloud computing data center, a system administrator finds that network throughput is a major bottleneck, especially during periods of high-concurrency network connections. Which of the following optimization measures is most likely to achieve significant performance improvement?
choices: A. Tune the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) parameters, including the congestion control algorithm and retransmission timeout interval.
B. Enable the multi-queue Receive-Side Scaling (RSS) function for a network interface card (NIC).
C. Minimize the non-uniform memory access (NUMA) across nodes in applications.
D. Adjust the maximum payload of transaction layer packet (TLP) of the PCIe bus.

title: Question 12 （11 Points）
question: After software is ported to the Kunpeng platform, it undergoes tests to ensure its stability and performance. Which of the following statements describes the purpose of a reliability test?
choices: A. To simulate user operations and increase system load until the performance bottleneck is identified or resources are used up.
B. To load certain service pressure and keep the system running for a period of time to check whether the system can run stably.
C. To measure the maximum capacity of the system, identify bottlenecks, and improve system performance.
D. To design and perform quantitative and comparable methods on a specific performance metric.

question: Which operations follow decoding in the Arm-based pipeline execution sequence of the Kunpeng platform?

title: Question 29 （11 Points）
question: Which of the following statements is true about the behavior of the RESTRICT attribute when you try to delete an index in openGauss?
choices: A. When deleting an index, openGauss automatically checks and deletes all objects that depend on the index. You do not need to specify the RESTRICT attribute.
B. When deleting an index, openGauss uses the RESTRICT attribute by default to prevent objects that depend on the index from being deleted unexpectedly.
C. The RESTRICT attribute does not take effect when an index is deleted because the index is a separate part of the database object and is not restricted by the dependencies of other objects.
D. When deleting an index, you can explicitly specify the RESTRICT attribute to ensure that no other objects (such as views and triggers) depend on the index.

title: Question 30 （11 Points）
question: Which of the following can be used to run the same command on multiple database nodes?

title: Question 31 （11 Points）
question: Which of the following is used to delete all information about students whose ages are less than 7 from the students table?
choices: A. DELETE * FROM students ON age<7;
B. DELETE FROM students WHERE age<7;
C. DELETE FROM students ON age<7;
D. DELETE * FROM students WHERE age<7;

question: In openEuler, which of the following commands can be used to query the remaining drive space?

title: Question 33 （11 Points）

choices: A. Standard error output is redirected to standard output.
B. Standard output is redirected to standard input.
C. Standard output is redirected to standard error output.
D. Standard input is redirected to error output.

title: Question 37 （11 Points）
question: Which of the following statements is false about shell commands in openEuler?
choices: A. Run "./my_script.sh &" to execute the "my_script.sh" shell script in the background.
B. Run "echo $SHELL" to view the default shell of the current user.
C. Run "cat /etc/shells" to query the default shells installed in the system after you log in to openEuler.
D. Run "echo $?" to view the current shell.

title: Question 41 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are true about the advantages of the openGauss multi-thread architecture?
choices: A. Threads share the same address space, facilitating data sharing and communication.
B. The thread startup overhead is greater than the process startup overhead.
C. The multi-thread architecture uses multiple CPUs to execute multiple closely related tasks in parallel, improving performance.
D. Inter-thread communication in the multi-thread architecture is faster and more convenient than inter-process communication.

title: Question 42 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are true about the openGauss compute engine?
choices: A. An optimizer is used to convert SQL queries into random execution plans.
B. An executor is responsible for SQL query and data processing and is the last process of the computing engine.
C. An SQL interpreter parses SQL statements entered by users into computing models.
D. The computing engine is mainly responsible for query computing and data processing.

title: Question 43 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are true about tablespace management in openGauss?
choices: A. A tablespace can contain only one data file.
B. You can run the ALTER TABLESPACE statement to modify the attributes of a tablespace.
C. When creating a tablespace, you need to specify the location of the corresponding file system.
D. Tablespaces can be used to organize and manage physical storage in a database.

title: Question 44 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following are DML commands?

title: Question 45 （12 Points）
question: A software company is considering where to release its newly developed applications. The company wants to utilize resources in open source communities to improve its popularity while ensuring private control on core code. Which of the following release methods are appropriate?
choices: A. Open source organizations: Join open source organizations and release application images in their image repositories as per community processes and standards.
B. Private repository: Create a private repository of the company to store and distribute images of core code, preventing sensitive information from being disclosed.
C. App stores: Release the compiled application to open source app stores and define the usage and scope of the application.
D. Limited open source: Create a private repository on GitHub and invite specific developers or teams to share some code and development progress.

title: Question 46 （12 Points）
question: To improve concurrency in low latency conditions, a company wants to deploy its HPC applications on the Kunpeng 920 platform. Which of the following are characteristics of the Kunpeng 920 processor that help achieve this goal?
choices: A. Adopts the complex instruction set architecture to improve processing efficiency.
B. Increases the number of memory channels from 4 to 8.
C. Increases the network interface bandwidth from 25 Gbit/s to 100 Gbit/s.
D. Upgrades the PCIe standard from 3.0 to 4.0 to double the transmission rate.

title: Question 47 （12 Points）
question: The Kunpeng DevKit Affinity Analyzer can improve performance of applications on the Kunpeng platform. Which of the following statements are true about the functions of the Affinity Analyzer?
choices: A. Checks and optimizes byte alignment in the source code.
B. Identifies code snippets that can be vectorized and matricized and provides optimization suggestions.
C. Analyzes and optimizes the performance of x86-based applications.
D. Cannot perform calculation precision analysis which requires cross-platform support.

title: Question 48 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following are basic acceleration features of Kunpeng BoostKit for Database?

title: Question 49 （12 Points）
question: In a Kunpeng-based big data environment, which of the following are performance improvements enabled by OmniRuntime?
choices: A. High computing performance. OmniOperator provides efficient operators to maximize computing power by using Kunpeng hardware features.
B. Automatic data repair and backup

C. Inclusive ecosystem. Big data components such as openLooKeng, Spark, Hive, and Flink are integrated as acceleration libraries, and development in multiple languages is supported, streamlining the development process.
D. Efficient data processing. OmniData facilitates storage-compute collaboration and accelerates data filtering and preprocessing, reducing data transmission overhead.

title: Question 50 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are true about Kunpeng BoostKit?
choices: A. Kunpeng BoostKit can improve front-end performance of web applications and does not involve back-end processing or database optimization.
B. Kunpeng BoostKit is an independent third-party software package that does not rely on Kunpeng hardware or specific OSs.
C. Kunpeng BoostKit integrates high-performance open source components optimized for the Kunpeng platform to improve overall performance.
D. Kunpeng BoostKit is a full-stack solution designed for the Kunpeng platform, containing optimization features for hardware, base software, and application software.

title: Question 51 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are true about the Kunpeng 920 processor?
choices: A. The Huawei-developed cores are compatible with the Armv8.2 architecture and can run at a maximum frequency of 2.6 GHz.
B. The number of cores of a single processor can be 24, 32, 48, or 64.
C. Currently, a single server supports up to 512 physical cores.
D. A single processor includes two CPU dies and one I/O die, with each CPU die supporting up to 32 cores.

title: Question 63 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are true about the SQL execution plan in openGauss?
choices: A. Each node in the execution plan represents a database operator, and the optimizer attempts to minimize the total execution overhead.
B. You can run the EXPLAIN command to view the execution plan generated by the optimizer for each query. However, the EXPLAIN command itself executes SQL statements.
C. The SQL execution plan is a node tree, which displays detailed procedures when openGauss runs an SQL statement.
D. The EXPLAIN ANALYZE statement generates an execution plan and also executes the SQL statement and displays the execution summary.

title: Question 67 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are true about the "find" command in Linux?
choices: A. "find" only searches the first level of subdirectories in the specified directory.
B. "find /home -size +1024k" searches for files larger than 1 MB in the "home" directory.
C. "find /home -user lisi" searches for all files and directories in the "home" directory owned by "lisi".
D. 'find /home -name "class*"' searches for all files and directories in the "home" directory that start with "class".

title: Question 68 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are false about parent and child processes?
choices: A. Child processes can access all stack data of the parent process.
B. If the parent process modifies the value of a global variable, the corresponding value in the child process will also be modified.
C. Parent and child processes share the same address space.
D. If the parent process has ended but the child process is still running, the child process is an orphan process and will be adopted by the init process.

title: Question 69 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following commands are used to delete multiple .c files in the current directory?

title: Question 70 （12 Points）
question: Which of the following statements are true about "$" in shell scripts?
choices: A. In shell scripts, "$*" and "$@" behave the same if they are not quoted in double quotation marks (""). They both treat each received parameter as one piece of data, separated by spaces.
B. "$#" represents the number of parameters passed to the script.
C. "$!" represents the ID of the process that runs the script.
D. "$$" represents the ID of the last process running in the background.

title: Question 71 （10 Points）
question: Use GRANT to revoke permissions from users if the permissions are no longer required.

title: Question 72 （10 Points）
question: Database permissions are used to control users or roles to perform specific operations on database objects in the database management system. Database permissions are classified into system permissions and object permissions.

question: In openGauss, once the security audit function is enabled, all user operations on all database objects are automatically audited, and specific operations or users cannot be audited selectively.

title: Question 75 （10 Points）
question: In openEuler, the swap space can be a partition or a file. It is primarily used when physical memory resources are tight, storing infrequently accessed data from memory to the drive to free up physical memory. Therefore, the main role of the swap space is to reduce the total amount of virtual memory in the system.

question: The "no_root_squash" parameter means that the "root" user is granted the root permissions after logging in to the NFS server.

title: Question 80 （10 Points）
question: In a development environment powered by the Kunpeng 920 processor, developers find that the memory usage increases abnormally when testing applications. In this case, the DevKit system diagnosis tool can help developers detect memory leaks in the source code.

title: Question 81 （10 Points）
question: On the Kunpeng platform, the BiSheng Compiler uses the "udot" instruction to perform the dot product operation. This instruction replaces the original scalar instruction and accumulates multiple channels of 8-bit data to 32-bit data, significantly improving x264 computing efficiency. In addition, the compiler uses the "urhadd" instruction to perform summing and averaging, which reduces operation instructions in a loop and improves overall loop efficiency.

title: Question 82 （10 Points）
question: When installing ExaGear on an x86 server, you can update the binfmt_misc component of Linux to register the parser of Kunpeng applications as ExaGear. This installation enables two major components: instruction translation engine and Kunpeng operating environment.

title: Question 83 （10 Points）
question: The Kunpeng 920 processor architecture consists of two CPU dies and one I/O die. Each CPU die can have up to 32 high-performance cores and 4 built-in DDR4 memory controllers for high-speed data access. The I/O die offers an advanced storage controller, PCIe and high-speed Ethernet interfaces, an interface for cache consistency between dies, and a hardware acceleration engine designed to improve performance of specific tasks.

question: An openEuler Long Term Support (LTS) version is released every year.

title: Question 89 （10 Points）

title: Question 90 （10 Points）
question: In openEuler, the "crontab" command is used to install, remove, or display the tables used to drive the cron daemon. Users place command sequences to be executed in the crontab file. All users share a single crontab file.
